name: Tumblr - Tweak - Big Small Sup Sub
description: Allows <big>, <small>, <sup>, and <sub> tags to function properly on Tumblr Dashboard.
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.tumblr.com"), url-prefix("https://www.tumblr.com") {  big, .is_reblog big { font-size: larger !important; } small, .is_reblog small { font-size: smaller !important; } sup, .is_reblog sup { vertical-align: super; font-size: smaller; } sub, .is_reblog sub { vertical-align: sub; font-size: smaller; } }
